title: File appears dirtied by code assist even when unchanged
description: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied, even though no changes have been made. As a result, the code assist feature does not appear. This bug report aims to address this issue.
OB: When I try to use code assist, the file is marked as dirtied, but no changes have been made. Consequently, the code assist feature does not appear.
